column4: okay, i installed Ubuntu 10.04 LTS. How do i get it to net-update to 10.10 now?
i did all the updates in Update Manager, restarted, and checked for updates again and there aren't any. is there something i have to do to get it to check for 10.10?
What edbian said. https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MaverickUpgrades has all the details.
Silivrenion: Spam. Please ignore, it's being dealt with.
